forecast.headline: Perfect Mid-Week, Wild Tuesday Wind Warning
forecast.week_summary: Stunning conditions Thursday-Monday with glassy mornings at Mettams and South Beach. Friday stands out as the pick of the week with light winds and perfect temps. Tuesday turns nasty with 30+ knot winds - stay inland or hit the cafes at Bathers Beach instead.

days.one_liner: Cool start but decent by midday, avoid windswept northern beaches
days.pro_tip: Hit Fremantle beaches - they're more protected from the morning chill

days.one_liner: Glassy morning magic at South Beach before sea breeze kicks in
days.pro_tip: South Beach at dawn for pristine snorkelling - it's firing at 80 score

days.one_liner: Pick of the week - light winds, warm temps, Cottesloe scoring 90
days.pro_tip: Extended morning window today - sea breeze delayed til afternoon

days.one_liner: Weekend crowds arrive but beaches still firing, early snorkel window only
days.pro_tip: City Beach groynes provide shelter from afternoon winds

days.one_liner: Strong winds building, grab early session before 21+ knot sea breeze
days.pro_tip: Leighton handles wind better - perfect for kitesurfers afternoon

days.one_liner: Stunning Monday recovery - warmest day of week, Watermans Bay glassy
days.pro_tip: 29°C day - perfect for extended snorkel sessions at protected reefs

days.one_liner: Howling 30+ knot winds, stay inland or hit Fremantle cafes
days.pro_tip: Perfect day to explore Fremantle's coffee scene - wild on the water

best_snorkel.why: Perfect 80 snorkel score with glassy conditions

best_beach.why: 90 beach score, light winds, extended calm window

hidden_gem.why: Warmest day at 29°C, crowd-free Monday with 75 snorkel score

alerts: Tuesday: Dangerous 30+ knot winds - avoid all water activities
Weekend crowds: Arrive before 8am at popular beaches
Extended UV: Sun protection essential from 9am onwards
forecast.fun_fact: Perth's sea breeze (Fremantle Doctor) is so reliable, locals set their watches by it - typically arriving between 11am-2pm in summer, bringing that refreshing afternoon relief!
